ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Solusek A
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks for the info!  From this and the maps I believe the room that was referred to earlier is the one leading to Sol B #3 zone line.  It looks as if that
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks for the info! From this and the maps I believe the room that was
referred to earlier is the one leading to Sol B #3 zone line. It looks as
if that would be an obvious place to pull to. What's across the zone line
from it in Sol B?

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: Adam Wasserman [mailto:wassermana@...]
Sent: Wednesday, March 15, 2000 2:16 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Solusek A


From: "Adam Wasserman" <wassermana@...>

with an average level of 26 you can easily camp the pred. my group is now
avg level 28-29 and we routinely camp the pred/foreman/singe/efreeti. (shows
you how empty this zone usually is)

check out the guide I linked to
http://lightning.prohosting.com/~awass/guides/sola.html ), it's fairly
comprehensive. the only part that I found to be incorrect was the suggested
hunting, but it may have been geared at a party of 3 or 4 rather than a full
party of 6.

Draelon

-----Original Message-----
From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:dean_kimes@...]
Sent: Wednesday, March 15, 2000 4:04 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: [eqbards] Solusek A


From: "Kimes, Dean W." <dean_kimes@...>

I remember a while back some bards on this list helpfully described a room
in Sol A to which one could pull safely. Our guild is planning an outing
there this weekend and I would appreciate some advice on strategies and
locations for hunting there. We are going to try to take down the predator
as well, would that be within the capability of a full group of 22-29's?
(avg level 26).

thanks!

Kit
